data.name: Black Panther (1MM)
data.description: Discovering Wakanda's Vibranium meteor and combining it with the Heart-Shaped Herb in the year 1,000,000 B.C., Bashenga became the first Black Panther.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing and apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
If any <color=#fff568>WAR DOG</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, this attack can Chain to <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> targets, cannot be counterattacked, and gains +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus.
1.nextUpgrade:

1.description:
Copy and clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, from the primary target. Gain <color=#86e619>+500%</color> Extra Focus for this action.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > Apply <color=#86e619>+2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>WAR DOG</color> allies, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>10</color>.
 > For each enemy with <color=#fff568>Charged</color> or <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color>, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>WAR DOG</color> allies, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>10</color>.

Spread <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>, <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, and <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, on self to all <color=#fff568>WAR DOG</color> and Starbrand allies.

This attack is unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
1.nextUpgrade:
This attack gains <color=#86e619>+100%</color> Damage per <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> on the primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary target

1.description:
On <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, gain <color=#86e619>+1</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

When a non-summoned enemy drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> maximum Health or is killed, if this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> for self and all <color=#fff568>WAR DOG</color> and Starbrand allies, then lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On enemy Turn, if that character has <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, gain <color=#86e619>+1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>10</color>.

Gain <color=#86e619>+10%</color> Armor.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, <color=#fff568>WAR DOG</color> and Starbrand allies gain <color=#86e619>+10%</color> Armor.
Gain <color=#86e619>+30%</color> Resistance.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, <color=#fff568>WAR DOG</color> and Starbrand allies gain <color=#86e619>+30%</color> Resistance.
1.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, <color=#fff568>WAR DOG</color> and Starbrand allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor

item.name: Gold
